page.title: 15Barnt Green Sports Club
page.content: This is a private Sports Club and offers squash, badminton and tennis to the local people. A person can join one or more of the sports and the subscription fee is approximately Â£45 per year for each sport. A family membership covers a family for all sports. Teenagers and children use the facilities as there is coaching provided for them and their membership fees are less than for adults. The sports club teams play in local leagues around the county. It is a very popular local centre for recreation.
